About Me

Hi, I'm Nick. I am a product designer currently working in Chicago with a focus on user experience design and product strategy.

I see the role of a product designer as an exercise in problem solving. Start by thinking about how the user will interact with the product and how each interaction will help the user perform the task at hand. I do this by utilizing my skills in interaction design, research, information architecture, content strategy, prototyping, and front-end development.
